Articles.Content: I have recently got a copy of KSP (from the lovey Tanuki, a streamer who recently did a 24 hour stream). I thought it would be best to say hello too all the lovely people! I am a big watcher of HOCGaming on YouTube, and is where I have learned a lot about the game and continue to watch on a almost daily daily basis. I will hopefully upload some images on my first ever mission tomorrow, but for now, greetings all.
Hello Tricksterzzzz, and welcome to the forum.

What's up, Tricksterzzzz? (That plural, or just you? Nevermind, I'm just being silly.) I'm fairly new to kerbal space as well, but do have experience in real world subjects that this game deals with. You said you were starting your first mission tomorrow? Can't wait for those images! It's always exciting to watch progress and achievements, even if they aren't mine (Hence Scott Manley). If there's anything I can ever do to help you with the game, just ask me. Gotta get that sweet, sweet science after all!

(I know a simple "welcome to the forums" would have been sufficient, but... I don't really have the grounds to say that.)

Hello Tricksterzzzz, and welcome to the forum.

Thank you

What's up, Tricksterzzzz? (That plural, or just you? Nevermind, I'm just being silly.) I'm fairly new to kerbal space as well, but do have experience in real world subjects that this game deals with. You said you were starting your first mission tomorrow? Can't wait for those images! It's always exciting to watch progress and achievements, even if they aren't mine (Hence Scott Manley). If there's anything I can ever do to help you with the game, just ask me. Gotta get that sweet, sweet science after all!

(I know a simple "welcome to the forums" would have been sufficient, but... I don't really have the grounds to say that.)

But then I could of gone "Hi! Im new to KSP". Short is boring! Im planning on getting my first mission pictures later today. Im not going to do every launch I do because some are boring and its just plain awkward for me to do. Hopefully I can capture some interest with my mission report later xD

Welcome to KSP, you've probably already seen other people demonstrating a lot of things. Doing them yourself is very rewarding but, as others will tell you, you can easily spend all your free time with this game!
Welcome Tricksterzzzz and Godspeed! All the best to you and your kerbals on your upcoming endeavors
I look forward to seeing your progress I'm really happy you got the code

Welcome to KSP, you've probably already seen other people demonstrating a lot of things. Doing them yourself is very rewarding but, as others will tell you, you can easily spend all your free time with this game!

Haha I do watch a lot! But even then, it looks easier than it seems because they have probably done it a few hundred times xD

Welcome Tricksterzzzz and Godspeed! All the best to you and your kerbals on your upcoming endeavors

We are doing well do far! Hopefully reach the Mun before long

I look forward to seeing your progress I'm really happy you got the code

Posted the first mission, just waiting for Mod Approval Im happy too! Really great you gave away codes, not a lot of people actually do giveaways for such expensive games!
